name: circrna-annotation
title: Circular RNA Annotation & Discovery
description: Comprehensive circRNA annotation pipeline. Identifies, quantifies, and annotates circular RNAs from RNA-seq data for genome-wide circRNA catalog creation.
content:
Circular RNA Annotation

Create comprehensive circRNA catalogs for any organism with a reference genome. Discovers and annotates all circular RNAs in your samples.

Applications

  • Genome Annotation: Add circRNAs to gene annotations
  • Tissue Atlas: Tissue-specific circRNA expression
  • Evolutionary Studies: Conservation of circRNAs
  • Reference Building: Create circRNA databases
  • Functional Genomics: circRNA regulatory networks

Pipeline Features

  • Multi-Tool Detection: CIRCexplorer2, circRNA_finder, find_circ, DCC
  • Robust Calling: Consensus circRNAs from multiple algorithms
  • Annotation: Gene source, exon composition, splice sites
  • Quantification: Back-splice junction (BSJ) counts
  • Filtering: Remove false positives, low-confidence calls

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet with RNA-seq data (ribo-depleted or total RNA).

Key Outputs

  • circRNA Annotations: BED, GTF formats
  • Expression Matrix: Quantification across samples
  • circRNA Metadata: Gene origin, genomic coordinates, splice patterns

Perfect for: Genome annotation • circRNA catalogs • Tissue atlases • Reference databases
